TopicTitle: [Bug] Structural Instability and Ghost Parts at Launch

Articles.Content:
Occasionally, I'll get this bug where a fairing I've attached to any structural part (and then deleted before launch) will appear vertically and destroy my rocket. It only occurs when attaching a fairing to a structural part and then saving the vessel. Then removing the part and hitting launch.

The WO is to exit KSP2 and relaunch the game. Its the only WO I've found.
